News.Title: Rolex Rings Q3FY26 Results Call on Feb 10, 2026
News.Summary: Rolex Rings Limited schedules analyst/investor conference call for February 10, 2026 at 02:30 PM IST to discuss Q3FY26 unaudited financial results for quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025.

News.Title: Rolex Rings postal ballot for remuneration hikes
News.Summary: Rolex Rings Limited issues postal ballot notice dated January 27, 2026 seeking shareholder approval for significant remuneration revisions for key directors and promoter group reclassification.

News.Title: Rolex Rings Gets Approval for Promoter Reclassification
News.Summary: Rolex Rings Limited receives BSE and NSE approval to reclassify two promoter group members to public category under SEBI regulations, with one member holding 1.13% stake.

News.Title: Rolex Rings Promoter Pledges 73 Lakh Shares
News.Summary: Rolex Rings promoter Manesh Dayashankar Madeka pledged 73 lakh equity shares representing 2.68% of share capital to Equitus Finance and Tata Capital on December 31, 2025.

News.Title: Rolex Rings Reports Decline in Quarterly Financial Performance
News.Summary: Rolex Rings reported quarterly net profit of 443 million rupees, down from 493 million rupees in the same period last year. Revenue decreased to 2.71 billion rupees from 3 billion rupees year-over-year. EBITDA fell to 548 million rupees from 660 million rupees, while EBITDA margin compressed to 20.21% from 21.98% in the previous year.
